participant_1.background:
I was honored to be able to donate blood in honor of my late sister.
i wait tables.
i graduated college a few years ago.
I'm passionate about the power of family to overcome adversity.
i love my parrot , todd.

participant_2.background:
I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
i made my first movie when i was 18.
My parents are not into LARP, but they support my hobby.
my favorite band is bon over.
i was born completely deaf.

content.text: Hi, what are you up to today?
I just finished making a new pair of earrings. I'm going to the LARP event later. How about you?
Nice! I'm just getting ready to go to work. I wait tables at a restaurant in town.
Oh cool! What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love meeting new people and I get to make some pretty good tips.
That's awesome! I love meeting new people too. I made my first movie when I was 18 years old. I'm not interested in marriage but I love archery.
That's so cool! I have always wanted to make a movie. My favorite band is bon over. What's yours?
Mine is also bon over! I love their music. I was born completely deaf so I can't really listen to music the way most people do but I love the feeling of the vibrations from the music.
That's really interesting! I've never met anyone who was born deaf before. How do you enjoy LARPing if you can't hear the other players?

My friends all know that I'm deaf so they'll sign to me when it's their turn. I also use a hearing aid but it's not perfect. I really love LARPing because it's a great way to get exercise and I get to be someone else for a while.
That's really cool! I'm glad you're able to enjoy LARPing. I've never been but it sounds like fun.
You should try it sometime! It's a lot of fun and you can meet some really great people.
